item.title: string-calculator
item.description: Set up your environment Javascript Please test your code using jasmine. Your directory structure should look like this. >node_modules <---- make sure this is in your .gitignore >spec > support - jasmine.json - string_calculator_spec.js >src - string_calculator.js - package.json Python Your project is expected to be completed using pytest. You are expected to follow industry best practices in all things. This means that you need to have a directory structure that is in good shape.
